name: DxpCompleteDeploy
description: Complete deploy in specified environment. Environment status must be in AwaitingVerification status. (Optimizely DXP, former Episerver DXC)
author: Ove Lartelius
releaseNotes:
v2.11.2: Use Node v20
v2.10.0: EPiCloud v1.7
v2.9.0: EPiCloud v1.3
v2.7.0: Run benchmark
v2.4.0: RunVerbose.
v2.3.0 Addintional Development Environment support

inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientKey. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ClientSecret
inputs.label: DXP target environment ClientSecret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP project ClientSecret. Generated in the PAAS interface.

inputs.name: ProjectId
inputs.label: Project Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The DXP ProjectId (GUID). Look in the URL when in PAAS for your project. You will see the GUID as part of the URL.

inputs.name: TargetEnvironment
inputs.label: Target environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: The environment that you you want to start the deploy to.

inputs.name: RunBenchmark
inputs.label: Run benchmark
inputs.helpMarkDown:
If you want to send information about your execution, to get benchmark data back.
 If you are interested of more benchmark data you can contact Epinova.
By using this function you agree with sending over the following information: Task, TaskVersion, Environment, TargetEnvironment, DxpProjectId, OrganisationId, OrganisationName, ProjectId, ProjectName, Branch, AgentOS, EpiCloudVersion, PowerShellVersion, PowerShellEdition, Elapsed, Result, CmsFileSize, CmsPackageName, CommerceFileSize, CommercePackageName

inputs.name: RunVerbose
inputs.label: Run Verbose
inputs.helpMarkDown: If tou want to run in verbose mode and see all information.

inputs.name: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.label: ErrorActionPreference
inputs.helpMarkDown: Prepends the line `$ErrorActionPreference = 'VALUE'` at the top of your script.
